metadata.synopsis: Warrior Plig is a goblin on patrol around the wolf pens in the goblin camp. She's bored and wishing for some action.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Repro steps:1. Start the game.2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. goto 390.90, 37.95, -57.184. Talk to Warrior Plig that will be seen patrolling about the area

0.speaker: Warrior Plig
0.text: Steal somethin' or act the bollocks, will ya? I'm itching to throw someone in the brig. It'll be fun. I promise.
0.context: NodeContext: plig wants the player to act out so she can throw them in jail

1.speaker: Warrior Plig
1.text: Either 'cause some trouble or bugger off. Ain't got time for boring.
1.context: NodeContext: plig wants the player to act out so she can throw them in jail
